UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the w3Develops application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

username_lowercase.description: Lowercase version of the user's username for searching and uniqueness checks.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography or description about the user.

socialLinks.description: An object containing social media links.

skills.description: A list of the user's skills.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

lastLoginAt.description: The timestamp of the user's last login.

lastLogoutAt.description: The timestamp of the user's last logout.

followers.description: A list of user IDs that are following this user.

following.description: A list of user IDs that this user is following.

followInfoPrivate.description: If true, the user's follower and following lists are private.

createdStudyGroupIds.description: A list of StudyGroup IDs created by this user.

joinedStudyGroupIds.description: A list of StudyGroup IDs this user has joined (but not created).

createdCohortIds.description: A list of Cohort IDs created by this user.

joinedCohortIds.description: A list of Cohort IDs this user has joined (but not created).

StudyGroup.title: StudyGroup
StudyGroup.description: Represents a study group within the w3Develops application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the StudyGroup entity.

name_lowercase.description: Lowercase version of the group name for case-insensitive searching.

creatorId.description: The ID of the user who created the group.

description.description: Description of the study group's focus or purpose.

memberIds.description: References to UserProfiles. (Relationship: UserProfile N:N StudyGroup)

topic.description: The primary topic associated with this study group.

commitment.description: The expected time commitment for the group.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the group was created.

Cohort.title: Cohort
Cohort.description: Represents a project cohort created by a user.

name_lowercase.description: Lowercase version of the cohort name for case-insensitive searching.

creatorId.description: The ID of the user who created the cohort.

memberIds.description: References to UserProfiles who are members of the cohort.

topic.description: The primary topic associated with this cohort.

commitment.description: The expected time commitment for the cohort.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the cohort was created.

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.description: Represents user-submitted feedback for the site.

feedback.description: The main content of the feedback submission.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the feedback was submitted.

userId.description: The ID of the user who submitted the feedback (if logged in).

username.description: The username of the user who submitted the feedback (if logged in).

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Stores notifications for a specific user.
